Name: Gamma Duo LL (2x Holographic)
Description:
Manufacturer: NV-TAC
Type: Projection 
Attachment Point: Optic
Magnification: 2x
Aim Time: +15%
Size: 1

NV-TAC extensively tested the Gamma Duo across a range of extreme temperatures to assure that thermal drift doesn't affect the accuracy of this 2x magnifier sight. This version of the scope includes low-light functionality suitable for operations in dim environments.
